about_the_game:
CyberTown - Is a game about interplanetary colonization where you create new cybernetic cities. Build, develop and strengthen your cities. Natural disasters, diseases, the needs of the population and much more will not let you get bored in this new cybernetic world.



Build a Cybernetic City - Build a thriving, multi-district city with efficient production chains and nightlife attractions. Follow the daily lives of your individual residents.



Build a Community - The lives of our cybernetic inhabitants are not just about work, sleep and food. Take care of the needs of your citizens, because they make up the cybernetic population!



Gather new Resources - Optimization and resource management often clash here with empathy and making well-considered decisions. Mother nature can defend herself against strangers. Be careful, because if you do not live in harmony with it, your cities will be threatened by natural disasters and diseases will fall on your inhabitants.



Corporation or Survival - Can you handle all the upcoming difficulties that await you along the way and will you become independent from corporations? You decide. Protect your cities.

Our best games


About the Game



CyberTown - Is a game about interplanetary colonization where you create new cybernetic cities. Build, develop and strengthen your cities. Natural disasters, diseases, the needs of the population and much more will not let you get bored in this new cybernetic world.



Build a Cybernetic City - Build a thriving, multi-district city with efficient production chains and nightlife attractions. Follow the daily lives of your individual residents.



Build a Community - The lives of our cybernetic inhabitants are not just about work, sleep and food. Take care of the needs of your citizens, because they make up the cybernetic population!



Gather new Resources - Optimization and resource management often clash here with empathy and making well-considered decisions. Mother nature can defend herself against strangers. Be careful, because if you do not live in harmony with it, your cities will be threatened by natural disasters and diseases will fall on your inhabitants.



Corporation or Survival - Can you handle all the upcoming difficulties that await you along the way and will you become independent from corporations? You decide. Protect your cities.
name: CyberTown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core / Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.

short_description: CyberTown - Is a game about interplanetary colonization where you create new cybernetic cities. Build, develop and strengthen your cities. Natural disasters, diseases, the needs of the population and much more will not let you get bored in this new cybernetic world.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Finnish, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Thai, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
